textContent:
What do I want? Me? Myself. What do I need?

I need to define my self worth on my character and values, not on my work or achievements. I need to embrace being worthy for being. Not for doing. I need to learn to be alone. I need to learn to love myself. To love myself for who I am. To invite people into my world without losing myself in a desire for their validation and praise. I need to know who I am in my core. 

I cannot give up my marriage with someone who is still willing to put in the work. I cannot give up when it gets hard when there is still a connection there. I cannot give up when the problem is actually me. I can ask gil if she will work with me and commit to working with me going forward. 

And I need to decide that I'm committing to gil going forward. not to what she does for me or how she praises me or supports me, but for who she is as a person.

I want to be loved for who I am. Not for what I do. But this needs to come from inside me first.
